name: The Legend of Zelda GBC
storyline: Many years ago Prince Darkness Ganon stole the Triforce of Power. Before he could steal the Triforce of Wisdom, it was divided into 8 pieces and hidden in the dungeons of Hyrule. Go find the 8 pieces and defeat Ganon.
summary: A Game Boy Color-styled remake of the original Legend of Zelda for the Nintendo Entertainment System for PC and Linux.

videos.name: Gameplay Video
videos.title: The Legend of Zelda GBC - Beta v0.23 (Windows & Linux)
